description.value:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger You use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Quick Alchemy] to craft an alchemical bomb that deals splash damage and is at least 2 levels lower than your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Advanced Alchemy] level.

Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded. Any target hit by your Strike with the bomb is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fascinated] by you for 1 round. On a critical success, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.
